trans-unit.source: Maps a code entity in a .NET Framework Web service method to an element in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) message.
trans-unit.target: 將 .NET Framework Web 服務方法中的程式碼實體 (Entity) 對應至 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 訊息中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> class is used with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class, which references an array of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping>類別會搭配<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>類別，即在參考的陣列<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> object can represent any one of the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping>物件可代表下列任何一個：

trans-unit.source: A Web service method input parameter.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務方法輸入的參數。

trans-unit.source: A Web service method output parameter.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務方法輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: A Web service return type, if not void.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務傳回型別，如果不是 void。

trans-unit.source: A SOAP input header.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 輸入標頭。

trans-unit.source: A SOAP output header.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 輸出標頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> objects are accessible through the indexed operator property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping>物件都可以存取透過索引的運算子屬性。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for an explanation of the conditions under which an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> object corresponds to a WSDL message definition's `<part>` element.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>類別在哪些情況下說明<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping>物件會對應至 WSDL 訊息定義`<part>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the .NET Framework type maps to an XML element or attribute of any type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 .NET Framework 型別是否會對應至任何型別的 XML 項目或屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the type maps to an XML any element or attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此型別會對應至任何 XML 項目或屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A true value for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping.Any%2A> property corresponds to the <`any`> element declaration and the `anyAttribute` attribute declaration in an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: True 值<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping.Any%2A>屬性會對應至 <`any`> 元素宣告和`anyAttribute`屬性宣告中的 XML 結構描述文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the accompanying field in the .NET Framework type has a value specified.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 .NET Framework 型別中的隨附欄位是否含有指定的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the accompanying field has a value specified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果隨附欄位含有指定的值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In the XML Schema, an element declared with a `minOccurs="0"` attribute value indicates that the element is optional.
trans-unit.target: XML 結構描述中的項目則是以宣告`minOccurs="0"`屬性值會指出是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: An attribute can be declared with a `use="optional"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以使用宣告`use="optional"`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework, using the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md), maps either of these constructs to a public field or property that is accompanied by a public field of type `bool` whose name is the first field's name with "Specified" appended.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 中，使用[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)，對應的其中一個建構，以公用欄位或屬性類型的公用欄位隨附`bool`其名稱是第一個欄位的名稱與"指定 「 附加。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping.CheckSpecified%2A> property checks whether such a `bool` field exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping.CheckSpecified%2A>屬性檢查是否這類`bool`欄位存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unqualified name of the XML element declaration that applies to this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 取得套用至此對應之 XML 項目宣告的非限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the XML element declaration that applies to this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 套用至此對應之 XML 項目宣告的非限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> that contains the name of the type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />，其中包含類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the type associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定之 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 相關的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the Web service method member that is represented by this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 取得由此對應所表示之 Web 服務方法成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Web service method member represented by this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 由此對應所表示之 Web 服務方法成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member can be an input parameter, output parameter, return type, input header, or output header.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務方法成員可以是輸入的參數、 輸出參數、 傳回型別、 輸入標頭或輸出標頭。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for cases when a member corresponds to a `<part>` element defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>的情況下，成員會對應到類別`<part>`Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中定義的項目。

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that with a wrapped binding between a WSDL operation and a .NET Framework method, (indicated by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle.Wrapped> enumeration member), the method parameters and return value do not appear in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 不過請注意的.NET Framework 方法時，WSDL 作業之間的已包裝繫結 (由<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle.Wrapped>列舉的成員)，方法參數和傳回值不會出現在 WSDL 文件。

trans-unit.source: When a Web service class is being reflected into a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> object, the return type's <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping.MemberName%2A> property becomes the method name (made unique from other member names, if necessary) with "Result" appended.
trans-unit.target: 當 Web 服務類別會反映到<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>物件、 傳回型別<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping.MemberName%2A>屬性會變成 （使其成為唯一的其他成員名稱，如有必要） 的方法名稱與附加"Result"。

trans-unit.source: This convention also is used, in some circumstances, while importing Web service classes from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects generated from WSDL documents.
trans-unit.target: 這個慣例也用來，在某些情況下，匯入從 Web 服務類別時<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>產生從 WSDL 文件物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML namespace that applies to this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 取得套用至此對應的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace that applies to this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 套用至此對應的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified type name of the .NET Framework type for this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 取得此對應之 .NET Framework 型別的完整型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name of the .NET Framework type for this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 此對應之 .NET Framework 型別的完整型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type name of the .NET Framework type for this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 取得此對應之 .NET Framework 型別的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the .NET Framework type for this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 此對應之 .NET Framework 型別的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace of the .NET Framework type for this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 取得此對應之 .NET Framework 型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the .NET Framework type for this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 此對應之 .NET Framework 型別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML element name as it appears in the service description document.
trans-unit.target: 取得顯示於服務描述文件中的 XML 項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The XML element name.
trans-unit.target: XML 項目名稱。
